summary.p: 8 fol. on parchment; Shelfmark: Marcel 126; Qurʾānic Text: Q 43:74-46:19; 16 lines per page; Dimensions: 210 x 148mm; Script style: kūfī D.Va.

This entry was created on the basis of the information made available by Valery V. Polosin (1939-2014), without use of manuscript images. Therefore, the exact distribution of the Qurʾānic passages across the manuscript pages is unknown to us, and all the passages are shown as belonging to fol. 1. The catalogue entry by Polosin contains the following information:
"Marcel 126
8 fol. 148×210 mm (1.42). Support: thin and transparent parchment. Writing material: dark-brown ink.
Collation: one quire, all the sheets are bifolia.
I: H1F H2F H3F H4F / F5H F6H F7H F8H.

Text layout: 92×148 mm (1.6), 16 lines. Ruling: absent. Script: D Va. Diacritics: superlinear and underlinear dots of modern configuration in the same ink as the main text. Vocalization: round red dots.
Verse markers: for groups of five verses – golden letter ﻪ (hā); for groups of ten verses – medallions in the text line (type 2''.A.II), in gold and colors.
Titles of surahs are written in gold: surah 44 – الدخان خمسون وتسع اية (fol. 1v); surah 45 – الجاثية ثلثون وست (fol. 4r); sirah 46 – الاحقاف ثلثون واربع (fol. 6v).
Stitching: thread has been preserved in the punctures of the central bifolium.
Inscriptions: numbers of surahs in Roman numerals and the verse numbers in Arabic numerals are inscribed in pencil on all pages ; on fol. 8v number “№ 6”, in pencil.
Defects: traces of moisture n the upper inner corners; round hole on the lower outer corner of fol. 84; all the margins are evenly trimmed.
Old accession numbers: № 6 (according to Langlois’ 2nd inventory)
Contents:
Fol. 1r–1v. Surah 43, verses 74(74)–89(89)*. Incipit: [إنّ المجرمين] في عذاب جهنم.
Fol. 1v–4r. Surah 44.
Fol. 4r–6v. Surah 45.
Fol. 6v–8v. Surah 46, verses 1(1)–18(19). Explicit: ممّا عملوا وليو[فيهم أعمالهم]."
Olga Yastrebova has translated and sometimes corrected the notes of V. Polosin. Corrected passages are marked with ОЯ (O.Ya).
